short_summary: Accommodations in St. Johns Newfoundland and Labrador
description: The Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) will honour the sacrifice of the Royal Newfoundland Regiment by holding a 3-day vigil and parade for the Unknown Soldier repatriated from the battlefield of Northern France to be interned in the Tomb of the Unknown soldier in St. Johns, Newfoundland and Labrador (NL). The CAF will contract accommodations, breakfast rations, boardroom and parking in St Johns NL for the period of 21st June to 3rd July 2024.
tags: Hotels and lodging and meeting facilities
full_summary:
## Accommodations – St. Johns, Newfoundland and Labrador

### Reference Information

| **Title** | **English** | **French** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Reference Number | cb-143-74037170 | cb-143-74037170 |
| Amendment Number | 7 | 7 |
| Solicitation Number | W8484-24-0579/A | W8484-24-0579/A |
| Publication Date | 2024-02-14 | 2024-02-14 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-03-11 14:00:00 | 2024-03-11 14:00:00 |

### Tender Information

*   Tender Title: Accommodations – St. Johns, Newfoundland and Labrador
*   Tender Type: Request for Proposal
*   Contract Category: SRV
*   Tender Status: Expired
*   Tender Method: Competitive - Open bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
*   Province/Territory: Newfoundland and Labrador
*   Region: Canada
*   Tender Description: The Department of National Defence requests proposals for accommodations, breakfast rations, boardroom and parking in St. Johns, Newfoundland and Labrador, for the period of June 21 to July 3, 2024.

### Documents

*   [Original Tender Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31980/accommodations---st.-johns%2C-newfoundland-and-labrador---english.pdf)
*   [Tender Questions and Answers](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31980/questions-and-answers-questions-et-reponses.pdf)
*   [Amendment 001](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31980/amendment-001-english.pdf)

### Contact Information

*   Emily Keenan
*   Email: [emily.keenan@forces.gc.ca](mailto:emily.keenan@forces.gc.ca)
*   Phone: (343) 598-7678

Note: The original solicitation number has been removed because it is outdated. The new solicitation number has been removed because it is not available. The last update was obtained using the access to the centralized procurement data contract repository.
